item.title: Northeastern University Marketing Association
item.description: Promotional Flyers From January-December 2016, I wrote and designed the flyers for the Northeastern University Marketing Association's (NUMA) weekly meetings. I also designed matching social media graphics for Facebook events, Instagram posts, and website banners. Logo Design In fall 2016, I re-designed the logo for the Northeastern University Marketing Association to help with their re-branding on campus. The new logo projects a polished and bold image, but also retains the approachability of the old logo through the rounded letterforms.
